snippet.title: Senran Kagura Reflexions - Announcement Trailer (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
XSEED Games and Marvelous Europe have announced that Senran Kagura Reflexions, released as Shinobi Refle: Senran Kagura in Japan in 2017, is coming digitally to Nintendo Switch in North America and Europe in Summer 2018.

Buy the latest Nintendo Switch games at Play-Asia:
https://goo.gl/xy9uwX

Buy Nintendo eShop Cards at Play-Asia:
https://goo.gl/WKr5Ew

Get the latest Nintendo Switch News at Handheld Players:
http://www.handheldplayers.com
